process.name: signal catch events

    <bpmn:startEvent id="start_interm_in_var" name="Payload In variable" pm:allowInterstitial="false">

      <bpmn:incoming>node_9</bpmn:incoming>

    <bpmn:startEvent id="start_interm_in_req" name="Payload in request" pm:allowInterstitial="false">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_21</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:intermediateCatchEvent id="interm_in_req" name="Intermediate Signal Catch Event">

    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_21" name="" sourceRef="start_interm_in_req" targetRef="interm_in_req"/>
    <bpmn:task id="task_interm_in_req" name="task payload in request" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_24</bpmn:incoming>

    </bpmn:task>

    <bpmn:task id="task_start_interm_in_req" name="task start with payload in request" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_28</bpmn:incoming>

config.content:
Order Form

Input Document

config.label: Content
config.helper: The HTML text to display

config.label: Visibility Rule
config.helper: This control is hidden until this expression is true

config.label: Custom Format String
config.helper:
Use the Mask Pattern format
Date ##/##/####
SSN ###-##-####
Phone (###) ###-####

config.label: CSS Selector Name
config.helper: Use this in your custom css rules

config.label: Aria Label
config.helper: Attribute designed to help assistive technology (e.g. screen readers) attach a label

config.label: Tab Order
config.helper: Order in which a user will move focus from one control to another by pressing the Tab key

config.name: Variable Name
config.label: Variable Name
config.helper: A variable name is a symbolic name to reference information.

config.label: Label
config.helper: The label describes the field's name

config.label: File Accepted
config.helper: application/msword, image/gif, image/jpeg, application/pdf, application/vnd.ms-powerpoint, application/vnd.ms-excel, text/plain

config.label: Required
config.helper: Prevent form from being submitted unless a file is uploaded
